text:
Hi HubSpot Family!

I noticed my account does not have the ability to edit a blog listing page. I was hoping to build custom modules on a blog listing page for our content editors. Is there something I need to enable in my account or has this not been released to all users yet? Thanks!
<@U7SL518D6> - Would it be possible if I can have this feature enabled in my HS account / portal ID? Do we anticipate all accounts to have this feature in the near future?
